page.title: 16SCOUTING IN WILMSLOW
page.content: Many of the children in our area a members of the Scouting Movement. At{2nd Lindow Guides we have 3 patrols. They are called{Swallows, {Bluetits,and Kingfishers.}At Guides we cook and play games. We wear a blue skirt and blouse and green neckerchief { We are 1st Lindow Scouts.We start scouts at 7:30-9:30pm.We have 4 patrols called{Bulldogs,Panthers,and {Kestrels. We}wear biege trousers,a dark shirt,a red neckerchief with a yellow rim. { At 1st Lindow Brownies we have 4 sixes.They are{Imps,Elves,Pixes and {Gnomes.We meet from 5:30-6:45pm.We make things and draw pictures.We wear a brown dress with a yellow tie. { We are 1st Lindow Cubs.We meet}6:15 - 7:30pm.We have 4 sixes called{Tawny, {Grey, Black and Yellow.We wear}green sweaters and grey shorts.
